data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The most common method of hydraulic usage is to have a cylinder that contains an internal rod. The ____ is ____ to a pusher ____. As ____ flows ____ the ____ plate, the ____ is ____ outwards. The ____ in a car ____ the ____ pads ____ when ____ is ____. The hydraulic cylinders in a backhoe push the bucket outwards.
data.partBlankContent: The most common method of hydraulic usage is to have a cylinder that contains an internal rod. The r__ is conn_____ to a pusher pl___. As fl___ flows beh___ the pus___ plate, the r__ is pus___ outwards. The bra___ in a car pu__ the br___ pads do__ when fl___ is app____. The hydraulic cylinders in a backhoe push the bucket outwards.
data.answer: 最常见的液压使用方法是有一个包含一个内杆的缸。杆与推板相连。当流体在推板后流动时，杆被向外推。汽车的刹车在使用液体时将刹车片向下推动。反铲机的液压缸推动铲斗向外。
